mapper.select: SELECT TNCBP.PRODUCT_CODE AS RISKCODE, TBP.PRODUCT_NAME_SYS AS RISKNAME, TNCP.PREM_FREQ AS PAYINTV, TNCP.CHARGE_YEAR AS PAYPERIOD, TNCP.AMOUNT, TNCP.COVERAGE_YEAR AS INSUYEAR FROM APP___NB__DBUSER.T_NB_CONTRACT_BUSI_PROD TNCBP JOIN APP___NB__DBUSER.T_NB_CONTRACT_PRODUCT TNCP ON TNCP.BUSI_ITEM_ID = TNCBP.BUSI_ITEM_ID JOIN APP___NB__DBUSER.T_BUSINESS_PRODUCT TBP ON TBP.BUSINESS_PRD_ID = TNCBP.BUSI_PRD_ID WHERE TNCP.APPLY_CODE = #{riskCode}
